mapper.insert: insert into entrada (equ_id, ent_id, sec_id, par_id, ent_precio, ent_fecha_creacion,ent_comentario, ent_maximo) values (#{idEquipo},NULL, #{idSector}, #{idPartido}, #{precio},NOW(),UPPER(#{comentario}),#{maximo})
mapper.select:
select a.ent_id idEntrada, a.sec_id idSector, a.par_id idPartido , a.ent_precio precio , p.par_desc descPartido, s.sec_desc descSector, a.ent_comentario comentario, a.ent_maximo maximo
from entrada a, partido p, sector s where a.equ_id = #{idEquipo} and a.ent_id = #{idEntrada} and a.sec_id = s.sec_id and a.par_id = p.par_id

select a.ent_id idEntrada, a.sec_id idSector, a.par_id idPartido , a.ent_precio precio , p.par_desc descPartido, s.sec_desc descSector, ent_comentario comentario, ent_maximo maximo
from entrada a, partido p, sector s where a.equ_id = #{idEquipo} and a.par_id = #{idPartido} and a.sec_id = s.sec_id and a.par_id = p.par_id
mapper.update: update compra set com_token = #{token} where com_id = #{idCompra}
update compra set com_anulada = 'S' where com_token = #{token}
mapper.select: select count(*) from entrada e, compra c where e.ent_id = #{idEntrada} and e.par_id = #{idPartido} and e.ent_id = c.ent_id

select h.hin_nombres nombres, h.hin_apellidos apellidos, p.par_desc rival , p.par_fecha fecha, date_format(p.par_fecha,' %H:%i') hora, s.sec_desc sector , e.ent_comentario comentario, c.com_token token, c.com_tipo tipo, c.com_monto precio from compra c, entrada e, partido p,hincha h, sector s where c.com_id = #{idCompra} and c.ent_id = e.ent_id and c.hin_rut = h.hin_rut and e.sec_id = s.sec_id and e.par_id = p.par_id and c.com_anulada not in ('S')
select 1 from compra where equ_id = #{idEquipo} and par_id = #{idPartido} and sec_id = #{idSector} and hin_rut = #{rut}

select e.par_id idPartido, e.ent_id idEntrada, CONCAT(s.sec_desc,' ',e.ent_comentario) nombreSector, e.ent_maximo maximo, c.com_tipo tipo , count(c.com_tipo) total from entrada e inner join sector s on e.par_id = #{idPartido} and e.sec_id = s.sec_id left join compra c on e.ent_id = c.ent_id and c.com_anulada not in ('S') group by s.sec_desc, e.ent_id , c.com_tipo

select p.par_desc , p.par_fecha , date_format(p.par_fecha,' %H:%i') hora, s.sec_desc , e.ent_comentario , c.com_token , c.com_tipo , c.com_monto from compra c, entrada e, partido p, sector s where c.ent_id = #{idSector} and c.ent_id = e.ent_id and e.sec_id = s.sec_id and e.par_id = p.par_id and c.com_tipo = #{tipo} and c.com_anulada not in ('S') order by c.com_id

select e.par_id idPartido, e.ent_id idEntrada, CONCAT(s.sec_desc,' ',e.ent_comentario) nombreSector, count(*) total from compra c, entrada e, hincha h, sector s where e.par_id = #{idPartido} and e.ent_id = c.ent_id and c.hin_rut = #{rut} and c.com_tipo = 'C' and e.sec_id = s.sec_id and c.hin_rut = h.hin_rut and c.com_anulada not in ('S') group by e.ent_id

select h.hin_nombres nombres, p.par_desc rival , p.par_fecha fecha, date_format(p.par_fecha,' %H:%i') hora, s.sec_desc sector , e.ent_comentario comentario, c.com_token token, c.com_tipo tipo, c.com_monto precio from compra c, entrada e, partido p, sector s, hincha h where c.ent_id = #{idEntrada} and c.hin_rut = #{rut} and c.hin_rut = h.hin_rut and c.ent_id = e.ent_id and e.sec_id = s.sec_id and e.par_id = p.par_id and c.com_tipo = #{tipo} and c.com_anulada not in ('S')
select par_id idPartido, par_desc descripcion , date_format(par_fecha,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') fecha from partido where par_fecha > NOW() and equ_id = #{idEquipo}
select par_id idPartido, par_desc descripcion, date_format(par_fecha,'%d-%m-%Y') fecha, date_format(par_fecha,'%H:%i') hora from partido where par_id = #{idPartido}
select sec_id idSector, sec_desc descripcion from sector where equ_id = #{idEquipo}
mapper.update: update sector set sec_desc = UPPER(#{descripcion}) where sec_id = #{idSector}
mapper.select: select sec_id idSector, sec_desc descripcion from sector where sec_id = #{idSector}
select 1 from compra where com_token = #{token} and equ_id = #{idEquipo} and par_id = #{idPartido} and sec_id = #{idSector}
select 1 from abonados_sector where equ_id = #{idEquipo} and sec_id = #{idSector} and hin_rut = #{rut} and abs_vigencia > NOW()
select c.com_token id from entrada e, compra c where e.par_id = #{idPartido} and e.sec_id = #{idSector} and e.ent_id = c.ent_id and c.com_tipo in ('R','C') and c.com_anulada = 'N'
select c.hin_rut id from entrada e, compra c where e.par_id = #{idPartido} and e.sec_id = #{idSector} and e.ent_id = c.ent_id and c.com_tipo = 'N' and c.com_anulada = 'N'
select h.hin_rut rut from hincha h, abonados_sector a where a.sec_id = #{idSector} and a.abs_vigencia > NOW() and h.hin_rut = a.hin_rut
